text: Shahin Kermanshah Futsal Club () is an Iranian futsal club based in Kermanshah.Shahin is well known for its fanatic fans in Iranian Futsal Super League. ==Season by season== The table below chronicles the achievements of the Club in various competitions. {| border="1" cellpadding="2" style="border- collapse:collapse; text-align:center; font-size:normal;" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" ! Season ! League ! Position !
